description: Angular component for a draggable issue board list with filtering and drag-and-drop functionality.

classes.name: BoardDndListComponent
classes.description: Angular component managing a draggable list of issues with filtering and status updates.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes component, subscribes to issues and filter changes, updates issues list.

methods.name: drop
methods.description: Handles drag-and-drop events, updates issue positions and status.

methods.name: filterIssues
methods.description: Filters issues based on current filter state and user context.

methods.name: isDateWithinThreeDaysFromNow
methods.description: Checks if a given date is within three days from the current date.

methods.name: updateListPosition
methods.description: Updates the position of issues in the list and persists changes.
